foreignData.name: Archon der Arena der Tapferkeit
foreignData.text:
Fliegend, Wachsamkeit, verursacht Trampelschaden
Sowie der Archon der Arena der Tapferkeit ins Spiel kommt, bestimme Artefakt, Verzauberung, Spontanzauber, Hexerei oder Planeswalker.
Spieler können keine Zaubersprüche des bestimmten Typs wirken.

foreignData.name: Arconte de Valor's Reach
foreignData.text:
Vuela, vigilancia, arrolla.
En cuanto la Arconte de Valor's Reach entre al campo de batalla, elige artefacto, encantamiento, instantáneo, conjuro o planeswalker.
Los jugadores no pueden lanzar hechizos del tipo elegido.

foreignData.name: Archonte de la Lice de la Bravoure
foreignData.text:
Vol, vigilance, piétinement
Au moment où l'Archonte de la Lice de la Bravoure arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez artefact, enchantement, éphémère, rituel ou planeswalker.
Les joueurs ne peuvent pas lancer de sorts du type choisi.

foreignData.name: Arconte di Frontiera del Valore
foreignData.text:
Volare, cautela, travolgere
Mentre l'Arconte di Frontiera del Valore entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli artefatto, incantesimo, istantaneo, stregoneria o planeswalker.
I giocatori non possono lanciare magie del tipo scelto.

foreignData.name: 武勇の場の執政官
foreignData.text:
飛行、警戒、トランプル
武勇の場の執政官が戦場に出るに際し、アーティファクトかエンチャントかインスタントかソーサリーかプレインズウォーカーを選ぶ。
プレイヤーはその選ばれたタイプの呪文を唱えられない。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 執政官

foreignData.name: Arconte do Coliseu da Bravura
foreignData.text:
Voar, vigilância, atropelar
Conforme Arconte do Coliseu da Bravura entrar no campo de batalha, escolha entre artefato, encantamento, mágica instantânea, feitiço ou planeswalker.
Os jogadores não podem conjurar mágicas do tipo escolhido.

foreignData.name: Архонт Предела Доблести
foreignData.text:
Полет, Бдительность, Пробивной удар
При выходе Архонта Предела Доблести на поле битвы выберите артефакт, чары, мгновенное заклинание, волшебство или planeswalker.
Игроки не могут разыгрывать заклинания выбранного типа.

name: Archon of Valor's Reach
originalText:
Flying, vigilance, trample
As Archon of Valor's Reach enters the battlefield, choose artifact, enchantment, instant, sorcery, or planeswalker.
Players can't cast spells of the chosen type.

rulings.text: The enters-the-battlefield effect of Archon of Valor’s Reach is a replacement effect that doesn’t use the stack. No player can cast spells or activate abilities after it has entered the battlefield but before you choose a card type.

Whether it’s legal to cast a spell is determined before its costs are paid. This means that if Archon of Valor’s Reach has sorcery as the chosen type, you can’t cast Morbid Curiosity, even if you wish to sacrifice Archon of Valor’s Reach to do so.

text:
Flying, vigilance, trample
As Archon of Valor's Reach enters the battlefield, choose artifact, enchantment, instant, sorcery, or planeswalker.
Players can't cast spells of the chosen type.
